Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • Server
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    An implementation of a Chat Server.
    Since:
    29/03/2017

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        The main method of the program. Run if the current Computer is to be set up as the Server.
        Parameters:
        args - Command-line arguments for the Server.
        See Also:
        Scanner, Server, Thread

      • loadKnownClientDetailsFromDatabase

        public boolean loadKnownClientDetailsFromDatabase()
        A method used to load all known Client's Details from the Database into the ConcurrentHashMap.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether the loading was successful.
        See Also:
        ConcurrentHashMap

      • loadKnownClientDetailsFromTextFile

        public boolean loadKnownClientDetailsFromTextFile()
        A method used to load all know Client's Details from the text file into the ConcurrentHashMap. Catches a FileNotFoundException if unsuccessful.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether the loading was successful.
        See Also:
        ConcurrentHashMap, Scanner, FileReader, FileNotFoundException

      • saveUserDetailsToDatabase

        public boolean saveUserDetailsToDatabase(java.lang.String username,
                                         java.lang.String password)
        A method used to save a new Client's login details to the database.
        Parameters:
        username - The user name of the Client to be Added to the database.
        password - The password of the Client to be Added to the database.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether the new Client was added to the Database successfully.

      • saveUserDetailsToTextFile

        public boolean saveUserDetailsToTextFile(java.lang.String username,
                                         java.lang.String password)
        A method used to save a new Client's login details to the text file. Catches an IOException if unsuccessful.
        Parameters:
        username - The user name of the Client to be Added to the text file.
        password - The password of the Client to be Added to the text file.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating whether the new Client was added to the text file successfully.
        See Also:
        FileWriter, IOException

      • checkUserCredentials

        public boolean checkUserCredentials(java.lang.String username,
                                    java.lang.String password)
        A method used to check if the given Client's login details are correct.
        Parameters:
        username - The name of the Client to check the credentials for.
        password - The password of the Client to check the credentials for.
        Returns:
        A boolean value which is true if the Client's login details are correct.
        See Also:
        ConcurrentHashMap

      • checkOnline

        public boolean checkOnline(java.lang.String username)
        A method used to check if the given Client is connected to the server.
        Parameters:
        username - The user name of the given Client.
        Returns:
        A boolean which is true is the given Client is connected to the Server.
        See Also:
        ClientInteractionHandler

      • getOnlineClient

        public Server.ClientInteractionHandler getOnlineClient(java.lang.String username)
        A method used to get the ClientInteractionHandler responsible for the Socket to the Client with the given user name.
        Parameters:
        username - A name which uniquely identifies a Client.
        Returns:
        The ClientInteractionHandler responsible for the Socket to the Client with the given user name.
        See Also:
        ClientInteractionHandler

        The method which is called when Server is parsed into a Thread and start is called.
